# NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentType.standard

**Case**

The standard segment, matching the typographic bounds of the range.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Kinds of text selection segments

- **NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentType.highlight**: The segment behavior suitable for highlighting.
- **NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentType.selection**: The segment behavior suitable for selection rendering.
